definitions.definition: A plant, Allium sativum , related to the onion , having a pungent bulb much used in cooking.
A preparation from Allium sativum used as a food ingredient or the flavor or other characteristics of such an ingredient.

main_definition: A plant, Allium sativum , related to the onion , having a pungent bulb much used in cooking.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) A preparation from Allium sativum used as a food ingredient or the flavor or other characteristics of such an ingredient.
